get.summary: Returns a random ActiveCallListResponse record of an active or queued call for a given product or product group, on an account. When attempting to pull for a single product, include the productId query param, when pulling for a group, include the productGroupId query param. For Inbound Products, use 'ACD' as the product, and for outbound, use 'OUTBOUND'
